SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) count FROM productInquiry pi LEFT OUTER JOIN product p ON pi.productCode = p.productCode JOIN member1 m1 ON pi.memberId = m1.memberId JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId
AND p.productName LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND (pi.content LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%' OR m2.name LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%')

SELECT reviewId, m2.name AS userName, pr.content, pr.regDate, p.productId, pr.productCode, pr.memberId, pr.showReview, pr.answerId, pr.answerDate, pr.answer, p.productName, pr.rate FROM productReview pr JOIN member1 m1 ON pr.memberId = m1.memberId JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId JOIN product p ON pr.productCode = p.productCode ORDER BY pr.regDate DESC

SELECT p.productName, i.title, i.content, i.regDate, (CASE WHEN i.answer IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS status, m2.name AS userName, m1.userId, m1.userLevel, c.categoryId, c.categoryName, i.inquiryId, i.answerId, i.answer, i.answerDate, m2.name AS answerName FROM productInquiry i LEFT JOIN Product p ON i.productCode = p.productCode LEFT JOIN member1 m1 ON i.memberId = m1.memberId LEFT JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId LEFT JOIN productCategory c ON p.categoryId = c.categoryId ORDER BY i.regDate DESC

SELECT pr.reviewId, m2.name AS userName, pr.content, pr.regDate, (CASE WHEN pr.answer IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS status, p.productId, pr.productCode, pr.memberId, pr.showReview, pr.answerId, pr.answerDate, pr.answer, p.productName, pr.rate, reviewImg FROM productReview pr JOIN member1 m1 ON pr.memberId = m1.memberId JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberId = m2.memberId JOIN product p ON pr.productCode = p.productCode LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT reviewId, LISTAGG(reviewImg, ',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY reviewId) reviewImg FROM productReviewDetail GROUP BY reviewId ) rd ON pr.reviewId = rd.reviewId
AND p.productName LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND (pr.content LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%' OR m2.name LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%')
ORDER BY pr.regDate DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

AND p.productName LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND (i.content LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%' OR m2.name LIKE '%' || #{kwd} || '%')
